name: syncthing-manager
description: Control panel for Syncthing. Monitor status, resolve conflicts, and force synchronization on Desktop and Mobile.

scripts.version: node scripts/version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json package-lock.json
scripts.release:patch: npm run lint && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run lint && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags

author: Gustavo Carreiro
